India vs Australia:3rd Test Preview

A comprehensive preview of the upcoming 3

India celebrates a wicket during their previous match

March 15 , 2023
Lakshmi Nair
Senior Cricket Analyst

MatchOverview

The third Test between India and Australia promises to be an exciting contest as both teams are eager to gain the upper hand in the series.with the series currently tied,this match will be crucial for both teams.India ,led by Virat Kolhli,will look to capitalization on thier home advantage , while Australia , under the captaincy of pact Cummins , will aim to bounce back after thier recent defeat.


❮ ❯

The pitch at the venue is expected to offer assistance to spinners.

Team News


India is expected to make a few changes to thier lineup , with young talent likely to get a chance to prove themselves. Australia , on the other hand,might stick to thier and testted players,through there are whispers of a potential debut for a promising youngster.
